title: My pixel 4xl sim signal not so good, sometimes its lost, and when it lost, the phone become very hot
content:
Like the question, i have bought this phone 2 days ago. Everything work greate except mobile network issue.
Still this sim card which worked perfectly on my old pixel 3. But when i put it in my new pixel 4xl. It's signal become weak, some time 4G change to H and some time change to zero. And when it become zero, the device become extremy hot( about 40-50Â°C.
I think this is some sort of the phoen software, but i have tried to factory reset, and mobile network reset for 2-3 times, but it seems cant helps at all.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
